title: Low to Moderate localised flash, Urban flooding expected in Sindh, Punjab & KP: NDMA
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP):The NDMAâ€™s National Emergencies Operation Center (NEOC) anticipated heavy rainfall in Sindh, Punjab and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KP) in the next 12 hours and a heavy rainfall in Thar, Umerkot, Badin, Islamkot, Mithi, Thatta Districts of Sindh.
However, the rainfall may cause urban flooding and increased water levels in nullahs, the National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) said in a news release.
The NDMA has issued instructions to all relevant departments to take necessary precautions to mitigate the possible effects of flooding and extreme weather.
The public is advised to take precautions to avoid flooding and keep a safe distance from electrical poles and wires.
The NDMA has launched the Pak NDMA Disaster Alert application, available on Google Play Store and iOS App Store, to provide timely alerts, advisories, and guidelines to the public
